Class Knights

  • java.lang.Object
    • Knights

  • public class Knights
extends java.lang.Object
    read 3 arguments: rows, columns, attempts . The first 2 arguments are the size of the board, rows x columns. The last argument is the number of attempts to make.
    Author:
    Joe Ippolite

      static boolean checkMoves()
      checks all 8 possible moves if move is within board then add to list send list to makeMove to make a move if no possible moves left check to see if full board and print check to see if attempts are left if no print board

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • startTour

        public static void startTour()
        Checks to see if the board is full. if not full starts a new board and sets the initial position to 1. then runs checkMoves to see valid moves and picks one

      • makeMove

        public static void makeMove(java.util.List<int[][]> movess)
        takes a list of possible moves chooses one at random checks moves again(recursive) if board is full exit

      • checkMoves

        public static boolean checkMoves()
        checks all 8 possible moves if move is within board then add to list send list to makeMove to make a move if no possible moves left check to see if full board and print check to see if attempts are left if no print board
        Returns:
        returns whether or not the board is full
